titleStmt.title: James M. Sebastian et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2233

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives

body.p:
Boonville Owsley County Ky
Oct. 13th 1865
Petition
To his Excellency Thomas E. Bramlette, Governor of Kentucky.

It appearing that there is a vacancy in the Office of Justice of the peace in the Boonville District, in consequence of the Resignation of L L Mainous Esq. And it appearing that H C Hogg is qualified and of good demeanor: he is therefore recommended to your Excellency, for a commission as Justice of the peace, in the Boonville District to serve, and fill out the unexpired term of L L Mainous, Esq. Resigned.

Respectfully
James M Sebastian
H B Hampton
C. G. Cole
Elias Batner
A H Clark
Thomas Merrill
Jas N. Hunlly
Elkanah WerineClk O. C. C

Justice Peace
Owsley Co
H C Hogg
apptd
19th Oct/65
